Name: Sergeant Forge
Description: Forged in the depths of a digital foundry, Sergeant Forge is a cybernetic craftsman known for his shiny black exterior and precision laser diagnostics. With arms and legs built to withstand the blazing heat and molten metal of his work environment, he wields a hammer with the precision of a seasoned blacksmith. His soldier-like buttons serve as a tribute to his creators who were once part of an elite engineering corps. As a member of the WebtrES club, he upholds the spirit of resilience and strength, always at the ready to build or battle, whichever the digital realm requires.
